option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"C:/Users/tuann/PycharmProjects/Delivery-Truck-Project":"{\"/main.py\":\"`TruckLoadingSystem`: A class that manages the loading and invoicing of parcels for a truck delivery system.\\n\\n`load_parcel`: Prompts the user for parcel information, adds it to the system, and checks if the parcel fits within the truck\\u0027s weight and volume limits.\\n\\n`get_invoice`: Calculates and prints the invoice for a specific parcel based on its weight, distance, and a set cost per kilogram.\\n\\n`loading_plan`: Generates a loading plan for the parcels based on their distance from the starting point (Hanoi).\\n\\n`get_weight`: Calculates the total weight of all the parcels in the system.\\n\\n`get_volume`: Calculates the total volume of all the parcels in the system.\\n\\n`main`: The main function that runs the Truck Loading and Route Finding System, allowing the user to interact with the various features of the system.\",\"/README.md\":\"This file appears to be a description of a truck management system for a delivery company called Hanoi Roadways. It does not contain any actual code, but rather outlines the requirements and data structures needed for such a system. The key elements are:\\n\\n`Truck`: A truck that can load and unload parcels from the front and back.\\n`Parcel`: A parcel that needs to be delivered, with attributes like weight, destination, priority, sequence, and dimensions.\\n`City`: A city that the delivery company services, with coordinates.\\n\\nThe file describes the need for a system to organize the parcels loaded onto the trucks, as well as a system to print out cash invoices for customers based on the weight and distance of the parcels. The file also specifies some sample data structures for parcels and cities.\"}"}
